Welcome to Dice Game's documentation!
=====================================


Welcome to Dice Game project.

This game has been developed by students in :ref:`Kristianstad University <hkr>` in Sweden.

The goal of game is to improve python OOP and sum them up with TDD coding style.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Documentation:

   dice_game


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   README
   univ
   reference
